Projects

Description

Full stack web booking application. Submitted as my final project for CS50, this web application is an online booking portal for residents in an apartment building to reserve our communal rooftop garden space. Users can view, create, edit and delete bookings by logging into their account.

Languages + technologies

HTML | Bootstrap 5 | JavaScript | Python | Flask | SQLite

Description

Weather web application for desktop. Using Fetch + Geolocation APIs this application will display current and forecast weather data for the user's location by default or any location using the search.
